reviews.review: A Game Made for Smart Butts, the game requires extreme problem solving, and has quick and snappy dialogue. At first its easy for any beginner who doesn't understand the concepts of the game, but the game wastes no time to challenge its players. The story is absolutely genius, giving us loads of character development, and plenty of plot twists. The Duo Mode is the extra bit that only adds to this game's Overall Fun. You'll have plenty of laughs with your friend as you accidentally destroy each others characters, and plenty of crying as you spend hours stumped on a level just to find out that the solution was staring you in the face. This game is gorgeous, funny, and smart, and it shows. If you're tried of the easy games you keep acing and you're looking for a challenge, try Portal 2. (Give Me Free Stuff Steam).
A true classic that withstands the test of time.
this game is a good workout for the brain

Amazing game. Great level design. Funny. Amazing story. Why are you still here? Buy this game!

I bought this game alongside Portal during the Steam Summer Sale. I've heard a lot of good things about the series, so why not purchase it?

Going in with high hopes, I can confidently say that this game is very very good. I believe that it is much better than Portal, it's also more memorable, at least for me. Puzzles are fun, though you can feel very stupid when you miss something obvious. Gameplay is fun and the characters are quite good. Portal 2 is a very charming game.

This game is a must have for PC. It's amazing and it's hard to describe why. The characters are fun and the gameplay is fun. Very good game. 9.5/10

Simplesmente incrivel, o jogo continua muito bom mesmo depois de todo esse tempo des do lançamento, portal 2 é jogo muito divertido de joga sozinho e com um amigo possui um bom enredo,gráficos ótimos e otimizados jogabilidade nada travada :D

A perfect or near-perfect game.  Well designed from top to bottom.  The puzzles are challenging but not as fiendishly difficult as some of the other great 3D puzzle games such Talos Principle or the Witness.  Solving the puzzles still feels very rewarding and by the end you really feel like they squeezed every inch of creativity out of the portal gameplay elements.  The game also makes great use of space, sending your person flying through the air and through large puzzle chambers.  Really keeps you involved and immersed.

On top of that, the story is simple but entertaining.  The humor is a tad try-hard at times, but overall the dialogue is very well written.  Great game with no discernible flaws, the love and care put into the presentation shows.  A must-play.

Portal 2 je výborná logická hra, která plně navazuje na příběh Portal 1.

Tato hra nabízí nové herní prvky, vylepšenou grafiku a mnoho dalšího.
Od začátku do konce jsem si hru náramně užíval. Hltal každou hlášku, každý detail, co hra nabízí.
Je levná, nabízí co-op (mimo příběhovou linku), workshop, kde můžete najít další hádanky od jiných hráčů, výzvy na čas apod.

Zkrátka nemám co hře vytknout.

[b]10/10[/b]
